mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, nickname, profile_image, language) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{language})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND is_active = true
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND is_active = true
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE email = #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET nickname = COALESCE(#{nickname}, nickname), profile_image = COALESCE(#{profileImage}, profile_image), language = COALESCE(#{language}, language), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET is_active = false, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
